mapper.select: SELECT id, user_id AS userId, last_reward_date AS lastRewardDate, updated_at AS updatedAt FROM daily_reward_log WHERE user_id = #{userId} LIMIT 1
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO daily_reward_log (user_id, last_reward_date, updated_at) VALUES (#{userId}, #{lastRewardDate}, NOW())
mapper.update: UPDATE daily_reward_log SET last_reward_date = #{lastRewardDate}, updated_at = NOW() WHERE id = #{id}
